headings.usage: All section headers, hero titles, modal titles. Use tracking-tight for sizes above 3xl.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, form inputs, button text.

primary.description: Vibrant Orange-Red representing the Holy Spirit/Fire.

secondary.description: Deep Crimson for solemnity and passion.

background.description: Warm Sand/Cream base, avoiding clinical white.

text.description: Charcoal with brown undertones for warmth.

spacing_and_layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A) for Landing/Features, High Density (Mode B) for Dashboard.

button.classes: rounded-full font-medium shadow-md transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95

variants.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-orange-500 to-red-600 text-white hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-orange-500/30 border-0
variants.secondary: bg-white text-orange-600 border-2 border-orange-100 hover:border-orange-200 hover:bg-orange-50

visual_enhancers.shadows: Warm, diffuse shadows (orange-tinted) instead of pure black/gray shadows.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the 'Warm Sand' background to give it paper-like texture.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use 'Lucide React'. Stroke width 2px. Color: Primary Orange or Charcoal.

hero_section.usage: Hero background with overlay or main visual.

prayer_card.usage: Cover image for 'Lead Prayer' booking slot.

worship_card.usage: Cover image for 'Lead Worship' booking slot (Alternative).

landing_page.hero: Full height with warm gradient overlay. Center aligned text 'Join the Circle of Prayer'.
landing_page.booking_preview: Horizontal strip showing next available slot.

booking_flow.layout: Centered card on mobile, Split view on desktop (Form Left, Inspirational Quote/Image Right).

dashboard.content: White cards on warm gray background. High density data tables for bookings.

universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio of 4.5:1. Use APCA calculator. Focus states must be visible (Orange Ring).
universal_guidelines.responsiveness: Mobile-first. Touch targets minimum 44px. No hover-dependent interactions on mobile.
universal_guidelines.motion: Use `framer-motion` for page transitions. Staggered list items.
universal_guidelines.data_testid: All interactive elements must have data-testid (e.g., 'booking-submit-btn').
universal_guidelines.theme_toggle: Include light/dark toggle, but default to Light (Warm).

instructions_to_main_agent: Configure `tailwind.config.js` with the specific HSL color values provided.
Use `Playfair Display` for all headings. Import via Google Fonts in `index.css`.
Create a reusable `BookingCard` component that takes an image prop.
For the Admin Dashboard, use a persistent Sidebar Layout.
Ensure the Booking Form validates: Mon-Thu only, 8PM-9PM slot fixed.
Use 'sonner' for success/error toasts (e.g., 'Slot Booked Successfully!').
